channel.title: Need help with includes
channel.description:
ok im have been trying to run varios scripts for different tasks...im kinda new at this stuff so plz help me out... this is the message i get.
include file c:program files\SCAR 2.03\includessrl/srl.scar does not exist.
there are 2 other of these that pop up also...wat do i need to do?

item.title: Need help with includes
item.dc:creator: @mastermonky mastermonky
item.description:
@mastermonky wrote:

download srl or go to file download includes

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with includes
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Martin, post:6, topic:20475”][quote author=kaodite link=topic=31083.msg362446#msg362446 date=1162075404]
ok im have been trying to run varios scripts for different tasks…im kinda new at this stuff so plz help me out… this is the message i get.

include file c:program files\SCAR 2.03\includessrl/srl.scar does not exist.

there are 2 other of these that pop up also…wat do i need to do?
[/quote]

\\\\\\//////////////\\\\\/////////////\\\\\\\////////////////
SRL/SRL.scar
make sure u use /////////////////////////////////////// not \\\\\\\\\\\\[/quote]

He did. Windows file structure uses , includes can use / or .

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with includes
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“kaodite, post:1, topic:20475”]ok im have been trying to run varios scripts for different tasks…im kinda new at this stuff so plz help me out… this is the message i get.

include file c:program files\SCAR 2.03\includessrl/srl.scar does not exist.

there are 2 other of these that pop up also…wat do i need to do?[/quote]

\\\\\\//////////////\\\\\/////////////\\\\\\\////////////////
SRL/SRL.scar
make sure u use /////////////////////////////////////// not \\\\\\\\\\\\

Read full topic
